‚óè PARKING: We are located in a pedestrian zone (ZTL), so it is not possible to arrive by car, drive, or park in this area. Entering this zone will result in a fine.
The nearest parking is in Piazza Santa Maria, a 3-minute walk from the apartment. Parking is free from 8:00 PM to 8:00 AM; otherwise, it costs ‚Ç¨1.50 for the first hour and ‚Ç¨2 per hour afterwards.
‚óè BED LINENS, TOWELS, SHAMPOO, AND HAIRDRYER: You will find everything you need inside the apartment.
